createNewGovernanceToken(uint256,uint256.details: This function creats new governance tokens for specified record

params.image: this is image of the gov token.
params.recordId: This is the recordId that for new token
params.symbol: This is the symbol of the gvernance token
params.totalSupply: This is the total supply of governance token

uri(uint256).details: See {IERC1155MetadataURI-uri}. This implementation returns the same URI for *all* token types. It relies on the token type ID substitution mechanism https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1155#metadata[defined in the EIP]. Clients calling this function must replace the `\{id\}` substring with the actual token type ID.
